input.sentences: we were so excited to find our dream house !
the house has a cute side patio | and a garage .
there is a fire place and and a dining room and living room .
the kitchen is spacious and has alot of counter space too
all of the rooms have atleast 2 windows . we ca n't wait to move in !
output.sentences: The family was excited to began to build their dream house.
They decided to attach a patio and garage to the house.
They put a fireplace in the living room and an archway to the dining room.
Plenty of spacious cupboards were added to the kitchen space.
The windows were the last addition and the family couldn't wait to move in!
